Uses of Mob in dungeon.model.items.mobs
 

Subclasses of Mob in dungeon.model.items.mobs
 class Creature
          Class representing a creature
Derived classes are Orc and Ogre
 class Hero
          The user-controlled hero mob
 class Ogre
          An ogre; stronger and tougher than an orc, but slower
 class Orc
          An orc; relatively easy to kill
